name: Honeyed Herb & Sriracha Chicken with Five Spice
ingredients: chicken, honey, sriracha, chinese five spice, soy sauce, olive oil, spring onion, ginger, thyme
recipe:
1. Create sauce: 2tbsp honey / syrup, 1tbsp sriracha, 1tbsp soy sauce, 1tbsp oilve oil, 1tsp ginger puree, 1/2tsp 5 spice
2. Add chicken to sauce
3. Cook chicken and sauce.
4.  Add to pan: 1 chopped spring onion and 1 teaspoon of fresh thyme.
